p.s: The British and American societies are very multicultural.
The majority of American citizen have ancestors who immigrated once.
The British society is much affected by their history of slave trade.
In the following text I will discuss the question in what way the influences, which are caused by this multicultural society can be positive and negative.
On the one hand, a multicultural society can affects the life in this country in a positive way.
There will probably be a big exchange between the cultures and hopefully they will even mix.
On the other hand, there is the possibility that people are prejudged and discrimminateddiscriminated.
There will always be people who think they are better.
Furthermore there is a high risk for parallel societies.
They already exist in the US, which is caused by their failed integration.
These societies which exist parallel affect the life, expeciallyespecially of children and teenagers in a negative way.
The impact on their sense of belonging is huge, since they are not fully American, but they do not see the homeland of their parents as home too.
But there is another thing you have to see.
This multicultural society can have a great impact, if you want to integrate and if you work hard for it.
To finish my argumentation, I want to say that there are many risks, but the question is: are they high enough?
The positive influences a multicultural society has are so present.
Your family will be able to learn things about other cultures and your children will be raised as non racist.
In conclusion, I want to say that multicultural societies will absolutlyabsolutely affect your life.
In my opinion the positive influences are bigger thenthan the negative ones.
The cultural exchange can show you so much and you could add interesting things to your cultural identity.
